filen.name: Filen
pros: Includes text chat feature with other users
cons: Public file sharing links are a paid feature

mega.name: Mega
pros: Includes text, audio, and video chat feature with other users
cons: [Research](https://arstechnica.com/information-technology/2022/06/mega-says-it-cant-decrypt-your-files-new-poc-exploit-shows-otherwise/) suggests that Mega's code is very sloppy and convoluted, raising the risk of vulnerabilities
Mega is [alleged](https://gitlab.com/thenewoil/website/-/issues/79) to have been involved in drafting anti-privacy legislation in the EU (unproven)

protondrive.name: ProtonDrive
pros: Includes ecosystem (VPN, Mail, calendar, password manager)
cons: Apps only for Android, iOS, Mac, & Windows. Web-only on Linux
Storage is shared with your email account
